text: Can ’ t keep their hands to themselves! Scott Disick and Sofia Richie were spotted packing on the PDA at the VIP Opening of Maddox Gallery in West Hollywood on Thursday, October 11. “ Scott and Sofia have a cute and effortless rapport, ” an insider told Us Weekly, noting that at one point during their outing, Disick, 35, even fixed the 20 - year - old model ’ s hair for her. The insider added : “ They both looked great — Sofia [ looked ] stunning and put together and Scott [ had ] what looked like a new haircut. Later, they stood posted up by the very crowded bar, relaxed, neither of them drinking. ” Us Weekly also caught up with Paris Hilton at the event — where guests sipped on specialty cocktails provided by Guillotine
